text: muham'mada sa.A.Va. Phakata payagambara ja che, temana pahela ghana payagambaro tha'i cukaya che, sum jo te mrtyu pame athava to te sahida tha'i jaya to tame islama manthi potani edi vade phari jaso? Ane je pana phari jaya potani edi'o vade te kadapi allaha ta'alanum kami bagadi sakavano nathi, najika manja allaha ta'ala abhari'one saru valatara apase
